meanings.definition: Clothes, linens, etc., that have been or are to be washed.
meanings.sent1: I need to do the laundry today.
meanings.sent2: She sorted the laundry into different piles.
meanings.sent3: The laundry seemed to multiply overnight!
meanings.sent4: Her overflowing laundry basket was a mountain of chores.
meanings.sent5: The fresh scent of clean laundry filled the room.

meanings.definition: A room or area where clothes and linens are washed and ironed.
meanings.sent1: The laundry is in the basement.
meanings.sent2: She folded the laundry in the laundry room.
meanings.sent3: The laundry room is my favorite place to hide from chores.
meanings.sent4: The laundry area was a hub of activity on weekends.
meanings.sent5: The laundry space was small but efficient.

meanings.definition: The act of washing clothes and linens.
meanings.sent1: Doing the laundry is part of my weekly routine.
meanings.sent2: She finished the laundry before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The laundry dance involves sorting, washing, and folding.
meanings.sent4: The laundry marathon on Sundays never seems to end.
meanings.sent5: Her expertise in laundry made her the family's go-to person.
